title: Stock market holds steady as rate cut hopes solidify
description: US stock futures were in a holding pattern Thursday as Wall Street waited for fresh data to test expectations that the Federal Reserve will deliver a December rate cut. The market seemed content to pause after recent gains while investors digested the latest …
